EmailTemplate.name: OSS_Webinar_10AM Reactive data-pipelines with Spring XD and Kafka.Confirmation 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Webinar Confirmation: Reactive data-pipelines with Spring XD and Kafka
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=There}}, Your registration is confirmed for the webinar Reactive data-pipelines with Spring XD and Kafka with Marius Bogoevici & Mark Pollack. We are looking forward to having you join us.
To help maximize your webinar experience we recommend that you join a test meeting before the session to check your system and browser compatibility at http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html <http://www.webex.com/test-meeting.html>. Event Details: Date: Tuesday, April 28, 2015 {{my.My Token:default=Save the Date}}
North America: 10:00am PDT (San Francisco, GMT-07:00) Join the WebEx <https://pivotal-io.webex.com/pivotal-io/onstage/g.php?MTID=e309a9eaaa842462f22949c75ec64949c>
Dial In: US TOLL FREE+1-855-749-4750 US TOLL+1-415-655-0001 Show toll-free dialing restrictions <http://www.webex.com/pdf/tollfree_restrictions.pdf>
Access code: 667 650 586
Thank you,
